content.detailedDescription: I saw the light from our second story of our home on the southwest part of reno near mcqueen high school. we are quite elevated and have a great view of the mountains from our second floor. i noticed the light while i was walking past a group of windows to go downstairs. i was viewing it in a space between 2 houses that are directly across the steet from us. the light was definately above the horizon (last mountain visible which would be over near verdi). it was not moving and was the brightest thing i have seen in the sky since moving here from truckee in the summer. i first thought it was some special star that was bright for a day or two like some stellar happening. after i watching it for a few minutes not moving, i went to look that up on the net to see if anything special was happening in the sky last night . after searching the web for less than 5 minutes i went to look at it through the upstairs windows again, it had moved but was still in the same area. initially i had thought it was just the earth's rotation but the move was to much for such a short amount of time. i looked throught the same window because it had no screen on it so i can always get the clearest view of the mountains, so i know my position of viewing was always the same. i got my wife to look through the window at it as well and we next went outside to look. that is when i noticed it was at least 5 times brighter than other stars in the sky in every direction ruling out clouds blocking the other stars brightness in the area. i know the moon was to my back but close to being directly overhead and was in a halfish phase and it kept the sky from being too dark. the light had a sparkling/twinkling look with yellowish/bright whitish color. we watched it for less than a minute outside not moving and went back inside. 3-4 minutes later i went back upstairs to look again and it was not there but there was a plane moving from west to north at the same eye level where the light was a few minutes earlier. i am not sure what it was but am wondering if anyone else has reported something similar. i would think the time elapsed would been between 10-15 minutes and i know i first saw it at 8:11 pm since my wife and i were both at the same computer looking on the net and we decided it was time to quit wasting time surfing the web after noticing it was 8:11p i want my report to be anomous but would like to know if anything similar was reported recently. thank you.
content.summary: Bright stationary object in western sky then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a first officer with a regional us airline. on our approach to fayetteville, our traffic to follow was an american eagle emb-145 who reported seeing what he believed was a large flare 200ft below him crossing his flight path, and flying level at what he assumed was 300 kts. approach had no radar signature, and the amer.Eagle flight lost sight of it. i saw nothing, and landed. 45 min later we arrived at the hotel, and i went to the balcony to have a smoke before bed. we did not drink as we had an early departure. on the balcony i witnessed a glowing object travelling west to east at close to 400 kts. as i continued to watch, it entered a cloud, and illuminated it bright orange. it exited to cloud and split (without sound) into two objects of the same color-yet the the mass appeared to be identicle which puzzled me. how could something split into two without losing 50% of its mass? one object continued its same level trajectory, while the other climbed at a rate of what i assumed to be approx 10-20,000 ft per minute at a 45 degree angle. i quickly lost sight of both objects, and throughout the experience there was no sound.
 at first sight, i believed it to be military- however, this was not an moa (military operations area), and secondly, there were travelling at close to 400 kts. (below 10,000ft aircraft must stay below 250 kts)
 i lost sight of the object when the one flying level was obstructed by the hotel, and when i turned attention back to the one climbing, it was gone.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing sphere travelling w to e low at approx 400 kts then splitting.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 last night 01-07-09 i saw an object over the river in knoxville . i called my girlfriend who was here with me and she saw it too . we live down by the river in a high rise apartment building on the six floor and i have a clear view of the river and the downtown skyline . what susprised me was where the lights were . you never see planes coming up the river, helicopters every now and then but not planes. when i first spotted it, it was past the stadium on the far side moving west to east at about 500 feet . the gay and henley street bridges are about a mile from here and the stadium is about two miles away . at that distance it looked to be about an inch to an inch and a half long between the outer lights. comercial aircraft coming out of or into mcgee tyson airport are going north or south. island home airport, which is behind the apartment building is about a mile and a half from here. planes coming into that small airport come or go east to west. and they are small private planes. and they don't fly up and down the river in town. the object or disc was moving extreamly slow and it had red, green and white lights strobing or flashing. it passed to the right of the building maybe by 300 feet but there was no sound coming from it. when helicopters or small planes fly by you can hear the rotors and the engine from the planes. and the comercial jets or military jet you can hear them. this was totally silent . the time we had it in view was about 2 minutes or so. just wish i had of thought of my camera .
content.summary: Object over tn river in knoxville.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed out at lunchtime to pick up fireworks. i looked at the sky which was clear with slight whispy clouds.A object that is best described as a moving star caught my eye. it appeared very high in the apmosphere and moved in short dashes with stops and minor turns .Two other people viewed the object with me untill it was to far away to see. we thought it might be some sort survelience craft since the democratic convention was coming. or mabye not of this world.About 5 minutes after the sighting fighter planes raced overhead with a loud roar.Whether this was for the fourth of july i will never know.And havent seen anything like it since
content.summary: Afternoon star in the blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in a local park and talking with an individual that i had seen there on several occasions.  it was a crystal clear day and i was looking at the grand mesa to the east which rises up to 11,000+ feet from the valley which is about 4500 feet in altitude.  i noticed a white cigar shaped object moving quickly from left to right toward the north face of the mesa.  it appeared to be no more than 200 feet agl as it approached the edge.  it followed the contour up and over the top remaining no more than 200-400 feet agl.  it's hard to say exactly how high it was because the distance was probably 15 to 20 miles.  i looked at my watches second hand as it crested the top and continued moving rapidly to the south.  it took exactly 15 seconds to travel from one end of the mesa to the furthest point visible on the southern end.  i later estimated the distance at about 40 miles.  my math says that it would have to be traveling in excess of 9000 mph to cover the distance in that amount of time.  there was no noise, no contrail, no after-burners.  i watch military jets fly in and out of our airport all the time.  i've never seen anything like this.  your guess is as good as mine.
content.summary: White to silvery white cigar shaped object.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On no less than 7 occasions between 18th of december and 4th of january various friends and i have witnessed an unidentified flying object at the various times in the evening over south queensferry near edinburgh,scotland 

friends have taken pictures which are even more surprising because the craft which appears to be ball shaped actually changes shape under magnification and clearly is an arc shaped. my friends and i who have witnessed this ufo are all professional people in the age range of 38 -60 and were not under the influence of alcohol or drugs on any of tjhe dates we witnessed the ufo.

the craft travelled on either a east to west trajectory or a west to east trajectory at heights between 1000 to 2500 feet.

it gives no sound, travels at very unusual speeds ranging from dead slow slow, hovering, move a distance then hover then incredibly in the blink of an eye it just dissapears - we came to notice the craft because we do not smoke in the house for the sake of our children - at first you think what exactly is this you are seeing and then you immediately seek to get witnesses - on every sighting we have studied the craft for easily 4/5 minutes at a time.

my friend {pid} has taken pictures of the ufo - nigel is one of the most intelligent guys i know and even he was totally mystified but fully in agreement that we have been witnessing some sort of craft.  

clearly a ufo and so frustrating as you know what you have seen and yet you wonder if anyone will take you seriously.
content.summary: Multiple friend and i saw myserious unidentified craft on no less than 7 occasions between 18th december 2008 and 4th january 2009.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were doing our morning hot tub ritual when we noticed a bright white light moving across the sky.  we see satellites all the time and thought nothing of it till it stopped and headed in the reverse direction.  it stopped again and hovered a moment.  then it started moving in a circular motion.  then it began to zig zag, looked like a firefly moving on my video tape.  it moved as if it was playing a game back and forth in mutiple directions. satellites do not do this.  have seen this once before out here, but i was alone and no camera.  this time my husband and i both saw and video taped it.  this went on until we then noticed the second shape that was just like it.  in the distance.  this went on until dawn and even after the sun came up and all stars were no longer visible these two objects were.  the kids woke up and i had to come in and when i returned they were gone when we came back out.  my tape is 8mm so i cannot email it unfortunately.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Comet like, bright white, looked like a firefly.

content.detailedDescription:
After about 2:00am 1-8-2009 i saw a face fly off into the
wall in the darkness as i was lyeing in bed.
the face was human and i did not see a body.
the face had black hair black eye browes and
with fair skin truthly the face looked simalar
to nick pope the ufo researcher without a body
i saw the face 1 or 2 seconds in fact i bearly
saw the face.

between 3:30am and 3:45am 1-8-2008 i had a second encounter
where this entity was grabbing me and i keep saying
no about 2 or 3 times and i started to wake up and
about 30 minites later i got out of bed. the ets have
at times would say something about jesus to get me to
go with them. but this time i could not hear the et
say anything but i was saying no as if i was answering
a question.
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in a high school parking lot with some friends a couple of years ago at night. we were all sitting around having a cigarette when suddenly there was a bright green flash off in the distance in the sky. it moved a little bit but whatever was making the flash couldn't be seen because it was behind clouds. it was starting to rain so my friends dismissed it as lightning but it was very close and there was no thunder. it also moved behind the clouds. i don't know what it was but it definitely had some sort of bright lime green round shape to it. what makes this so odd is that we live very close to new york city in a very densely populated ares of new jersey so light pollution makes most things, including planes and stars in the sky almost impossible to see. the cloud cover was also relatively thick so in order for something to be as bright was it was says something about how intense the light was. a strange experience that seemed to freak everyone out initially but was eventually dismissed as some sort of strange lightning. 
i do know such a thing as colored lightning exists but that there was no lightning that night, that it was in the the sky behind the clouds, and that it was silent makes me think it was not lightning. 
attached is an image i made of what i think it looked like.
content.summary: Bright green flash behind clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was comin out of gotham cause it was gay night at around 2 am , i walked out wit some guy i just met we were about to go back to my place but he went back to get our jackets and i went out for a smoke. ijust happened to look up and a cone / circle shape object was there then witin seconds it was gone..Im still shocked
content.summary: I was coming out of the club and i looked up and couldn't believe my eyes a real ufo, i still cant believe it now!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting in line at the griffith observatory.  my wife and kids were wandering around.  i saw a star in the sky that was brighter than any of the other ones.  i watched it for a while and it didn't move. it just pulsed brighter then darker. it finally started flying away. it didn't look like any of the other stars.  i asked the guy next to me about it but he didn't speak english.
it was a good place for sightings.  i didn't freak out or anything though because i've seen them before especially up there because the view is so good. they never cease to amaze me though. when your watching it's like you just go into another world.
content.summary: Saw star in sky that moved.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday august 23, 2008, my partner and i departed aboard the pride of bilbao (a ferry/cruise ship), destined for northern spain. as we left the dock at southapmton, we stood at the back of the boat to watch the port dissapear behind us. it was dark at the time and we left at about 8:30pm, a little later than scheduled.

as we stood there, i noticed a white ball of light in the sky moving about over the town itself. i pointed it out to my girlfriend and she confirmed that she could also see it. after about 30 seconds, the ball sped up and started whizzing back and forth, up and down around the town. by this point we were a bit freaked out. we tried to take photos, but it was too far away and too small to pick anything up.

some time into the sighting, a passenger plane also flew across the towm. the ball proceeded to follow the plane and then appeared to loop around it a couple of times. again, we both witnessed this.

as the boat got further out to see, we lost the object and were left standing at the back of the ship, utterly gobsmacked.

the sighting lasted about 10 minutes.
content.summary: Ufo witnessed by 2 people in southampton while leaving docks on cruise ship.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy were just sitting parked in a cul-de-sac in my car (smoking a joint) when what i thought was a helicopter came down and hovered about 200 feet above and a little in front of and to the left side of my car, but it wasn't a helicopter because it wasn't making any noise. it was rather small. maybe the size of an suv. i couldn't see a shape, just a white spotlight. after staring at it for 2-3 minutes or so it just started moving away (that's the best i can describe it's motion) in the sky smoothly but at an impossible rate of speed without making a sound. and that was it. we were both perplexed. i think it probably lingered with me more than him. i'm pretty sure it was secret military technology mainly due to its size. no race of beings travels the cosmos in a craft that small, unless there was/is a mothership somewhere close by.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Relatively small white light, fast, made no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9pm i was headed out of burns to burns junction on highway 78 in late september 2004. as i approached the small town of crane i noticed a light in the sky that was changing colors rapidly. i was thinking of a logical explanation for this thing, helicopter, plane etc. as i got closer it just dissapeared. i was sure that someone else had to see it as it was just above crane. i continued on and about 3 miles before the alvord desert turnoff i saw it again in between to of the peaks of the small mountian or "folley farm" people call it. it was about a mile away i would eventually drive underneath it. as i headed toward the road made a sweeping left turn when i came around it it was gone. i remember feeling very alone out there because there was absoloutley no other traffic. a little scared and very confused i kept on heading to burns junction,checking my mirrors and the sky carefully. i was around mm 83 within view of the lighs a b.J. when i out of the corner of my eye i noticed a beam of light hit the desert floor to my left and within milseconds it seemed to turn to daylight i looked up and about a 100yds away maybe 200yds up a huge redish on the outside white in the center object just hovered there and dissapeared in the blink of an eye. all the hairs on the back of my head stood straight up, that was the last time i saw it. i will never know what it was but i definetly will never forget. i know othe people had to see this when it was around crane, so far i have found just one.
content.summary: Round bright ball that changed colors - crane to burns junction.

content.detailedDescription: Letting my dogs in at 11:20 stood on back porch. crisp, clear night, cold abit windy. at first i thought it was the farmer that owns the fields. had white lights in back, white , what i thought were flood lights on top and white and red lights in front. the farmer doesn't own a vehicle like that. then i thought that it was a police car maybe chasing someone in the field it being new years eve. it started on the right even with my yard about 100yds from the porch. slowly moved past me down past the neighbors yard turned north seemed to bounce a little and went up a hill over the top turning north west. my husband came out of the restroom and i told him the cops were chasing someone in the field. the next morning my husband and i were discussing it and remembered the farmer runs a hot wire because he runs cattle there. we called him and told him what i saw and out he came to check the fence. he called back later and said the fence was fine and no tire tracks. now i called the police department and the chief of police said no one was out in the field that night. my husband and i talked about it again and i realized there was no exhaust, and no sound. not the first time we've seen many strange things in this field. i've reported quite a few and this is  just one more to add to the growing list. considering that the fence was fine and there were no tire tracks i assume it was floating off the ground and the  bounce i saw it do was to avoid the fence.
content.summary: Saw in field out back what i thought was a patrol car but no tire tracks.

content.detailedDescription: January,05 2009...Normally when i'm home,i go to smoke at the patio of my aparment;so like always sit on my chair and look at the sky.When i saw this weird flashing light coming east towards west...So i follow it for a couple minutes;it was like floating not like the versions that i know about crazy manuvering,so i turn my sigth back to see another ligth doing the same.Flashing red and white ligth,i came inside to ask my roommate to go outside and check the ligths;to my sorprise more ligths were on view.We spend some minutes looking aroud and there were some coming back west towards east by san jacinto mountains.I spend about 1:00 looking at this fenomenon;so i decided to call nbc news to report this ligths.Next morning around 10:30am i so a triangular object following same pattern.  tuesday nigth at work explain to a couple of coworkers what i saw,so i came outside of the restaurant about 18:35pm and looking to the sky to found out the ligths were on;so i ask my coworkers to see them.They think the ligths are planes.This event is been happening for 3 days now. i reported to news and police deparment and they said nobody has report nothing so we will check on it.I have no cameras to photograph them.I hope somebody else will come forward with reports or pictures or videos of this event.Thank you.  sincerelly.
content.summary: Weird ligths flashing following pattern like surrounding this valley.

content.detailedDescription: I think it was 1985, in december, my daughter and i were going home having just finished grocery shopping. while driving along i thought i saw something amiss out of the peripheral vision on my right side. i kept trying to get a better look at what this was but it was difficult to do while driving. i asked my daughter if she saw anything? she said she did but didn't know what it was.I saw orange lights which were very large but couldn't tell what, if anything, they were attached to. i knew something odd was "up" and decided to pull the car over to the side of the road. as i moved to get out of the car, my daughter said something like " don't get out mom you don't know what that thing is." i got out. as i looked up all i could see was an enormous dark "thing" gliding over the tops of the trees. it was absolutely silent. then i noticed orange lights on it and it took me a minute to realize that there were three of them (lights).Once i focused on the lights, i was able to make out the shape of this thing and saw that it was a triangle or arrowhead shape. it was so large and moving so slow that i was able to watch this object as it just glided over top of us. the orange lights seemed to be at, or near. the point of each corner of the triangle. they glowed and pulsed. after i could no longer see this object, we drove home. told my husband at the time but he was fairly skeptical.
content.summary: Driving home saw something out of the corner of my eye off to the left  in the sky. got out of car and saw a huge triangle shaped object move very slowly and quietly just over the treetops.

content.detailedDescription: In the village of cornwall-on-hudson, ny there was a july fourth celebration at the farm of a local citizen every year. in 1965 i was 13 years old and was in the pageant that year at the farm along with a few friends of mine. after the pageant was over, we settled down next to, and a little under, a wagon which was there because it had started to thunder and lightning as we waited for the fireworks to begin. the fireworks did start. suddenly, there was a tremendous flash of lightning at the same time a firework went off in the sky.  i looked up and saw an absolutely huge saucer shaped object sitting right over the " mountain " which we were next to. if this is really classified as a mountain it's not a large one, since we, as kids, used to climb it frequently, although it is pretty high and gives a nice view of the local hudson valley. the mountain is called round top.  after seeing the object my friends and i all, almost at the same time decided it was time to leave the area although we really didn't dicuss what we had just seen. come to think of it, this topic was never dicussed amongst us in any of the remaining years we were together. at the age of 13 i was pretty un-nerved by what i had seen and had to walk home alone, needless to say i ran most of the way. when i got home i told my mom and dad what i had seen but they didn't believe me even though they frequently said they would love to see a ufo. ( there were a lot of sightings in the area at this time though i don't remember hearing too much about them at that time.)     as to the object that i saw this night..........  it was huge but i have know way of describing in writing just how big it was. it was hanging there not moving at all. there was what i thought to be a window which i assumed wrapped all the way around the saucer which was opaque. there were no panes in the window or any kind of divisions. there were no beings prresent in the windows. but there was an orange strobe-type light which went around the inside of the window in a rotating or pulsing fashion. after i looked up and saw the craft, i looked at it briefly, turned my head away, looked back up and it was gone.  i did not hear anyone at the farm discuss seeing this object either on that night or ever.
content.summary: During fireworks and lightning looked up to see a huge saucer shaped object sitting almost on top of local "mountain."

content.detailedDescription: After a late night of fishing while on vacation.My ex- wife and i saw a fire ball with a long fiery tail travel just above the horizon from north to south in a horizontal flight path for about five minutes.I shut the motor off and drifted while we watched it.It made no noise that we could hear.It was orangeish to white with a long curling fiery tail.I have always wondered what this was.Space junk?Meteor?The only thing i have ever seen that reminds me of what i saw that night were ancient chineese depictions of comets.I have since seen actual pictures of comets and this did not look like that plus it appeared that the thing was in our atmosphere not in outer space.
content.summary: Saw a fireball travel just above the horizon while fishing on a lake.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 1982.   i was 14, living in eliot, maine - a small town across the river from portsmouth, new hampshire.  our house was empty, as we were moving to alaska that week, and the movers had already taken our belongings.  it was dusk, and i was upstairs in my room, laying in my sleeping bag, listening to the radio, and looking out of the window which no longer had curtains.  suddenly i saw a black, geometric object zig-zagging rapidly in the air above the treeline of the woods behind my house.  its distance from me at this point was about 1.5 football field lengths away.  the zig-zag motion reminded me of an air hockey puck, with seemingly instantaneous changes in direction.  even weirder was that it seemed to disappear and reappear during its trajectory - seeming to 'skip over' parts of it's travel.  it was zig-zagging, but its general direction of travel was towards me.  the object kept its height in the air constant, about 5 feet above the trees.  i got up and kneeled at the window to get a better look, but could no longer see it.  the way it moved made the sight seem unreal, and i stayed kneeling by the window for a few minutes to try to see the object again, but did not.  i could not comprehend what i had seen. 

as i started to look away from the window to go back to laying down, out of the corner of my eye, i noticed the object right outside the window, perfectly still, and silent.  it was at the height of my window on the second story, and only 20 feet away.  it looked like it was made of metal, a dull gun-metal black, with no windows, lights, doors or seams of any kind, but it did have a few small protrusions which looked like instrumentation - giving me the impression the object was some sort of machinery, rather than just a geometric shape.  it was the approximate size of an automobile.  it's shape was a sort of trapezoid - a square or rectangle 'front' and a larger square or rectangle in the back, so the craft tapered from the back to the front. 

i had absolutely no fear of the object - only curiosity as to what it was i was looking at.  i got to observe it for about 4 seconds, then it left in an instant.  it left so fast, that i could just barely tell that it left in a direction, rather than just disappearing.  the object left in the opposite direction it came from.  and though the craft seemed to have a front and a back, it did not turn around before reversing its direction.

there was no electromagnetic interference or missing time, as evidenced by the music on the radio.  when the song on the radio ended, the dj came on saying that he was getting inundated with calls about some object seen in the air.  i called the radio station as well, and told the dj that i too had seen the object, but that was as much as i told him.

i have never heard any other ufo report describing a craft shaped like this.  my whole life, i rarely thought about this experience.  not until recently, when i saw a show on ufo's describing the same flight characteristic, did i really start to think about my experience, and realize that what i saw was a ufo. 

i am an engineer now, and so understand that this craft displayed flight characteristics which defy our understanding of physics.  it had no wings or control surfaces of any sort, and was entirely silent.  it didn't need to move to stay aloft.  it seemed unaffected by gravity or inertia.  it had the ability to change speed and direction instantaneously, and it had sit motionless in the air. 

supposedly, there were a lot of people who saw this craft and called that radio station that night.  i'm hoping that there are records of this event somewhere.

military bases are nearby.  there were no helicopters or other aircraft in the area.  weather was clear, light levels were still adequate to get a good look at the craft.  there were no smells or sounds, nor any pictures or video taken that i know of.
content.summary: Ufo close up outside my window.

content.detailedDescription:
I walk every morning, seven days a week, like clock-work from 6 30a.M. til 7 07a.M.
it is winter and lately the mornings have been exceptionally dreary, dismal, dawn is slow in coming.
this morning was clear, no clouds and light was beginning to herald in the east but the sky was still dark, pinpoint stars above.  i was walking west on the right side of a three small ponds.
i look'd up and saw a saturn like disc.
at first, i thought it was either saturn or venus or perhaps jupiter, but i didn't think the timing of the cycle was right but sometime positions seem to change over night, but truth told, you just are not observant of the slowly shift until one day you notice and it is a significant shift.

not the case, the opaque light begin to move forward directly toward me, i noticed it at 3 o clock in the sky.
i stopp'd, began to observe.
it was moving lazy but not like an airplane.
there was no accompanying noise.

i watch'd it.
then i heard a noise and so i thought, "aha, it is an airplane."
it had no blinking lights.
just look'd like saturn or venus moving in the sky.

then i saw the culprit, the real airplane.
i had an airplane to compare the moving object with.
the ufo was moving lazily yet more smooth than the airplane, as if, it were in a different sort of atmosphere.

i watch'd it move over me at 12 o clock, then head toward the s.E. and as it left, it became smaller and but not dimmer.

truth, i feel as if "there are mysteries that are being reveal'd."
my study this morning was from 1 corinthians 2--"no, we speak of god's secret wisdom among the mature,but not the wisdom of this age or of the rulers of this age, who are coming to nothing."

in greek, the word mystery is translated musteriom--and we as "modern minded people" think of mystery as something unknown-but the truth of the greek work, musterium-closer interpretation is "sacred secrets."

so i felt--as if there are things to know that are received when you receive on a deeper level.
quite simple, really.
content.summary: Another sighting, approximately same time.

content.detailedDescription:
My 2 daughters and i were on the golf course looking up at the stars when my eldest and i saw this shadow come from the east towards the mountains heading westerly.  it was at a high altitude.  the shadow was more like a heat bubble (vapor bubble)that slightly distorted the stars.  imagine a convex glass paper weight being drawn across newspaper print.  the stars were distorted.  it was obviously a defraction of the light.  the shadow raced across the sky from our left (we were facing south) to overhead.  there was one than another in sequence.  they momentarily paused and shot to the west.  as the shadow moved towards the mountains we saw two distinct small spheres of light that were pertectly parallel and traveling at the same speed, exceptionally fast.  there was no noise and they covered a significant amount of distance in seconds.  from the shadow over head to out of sight over the mountains and beyond took approximatley 3 seconds. 
there were no blinking lights, like an aircraft just two distinct small round lights as it passed.  it was if these spheres were pushing through the atmoshpere like a boat/submarine pushes throuhgh water.
i was not sure what the object was, but it sure moved fast.  i don't know if this means anything but that night there was a low level earth quake in the desert.
content.summary: Dark shadow like an oblong bubble that turned into 2 lights as it speed away.

content.detailedDescription:
At 20:35 my wife went outside to have a smoke, she came right back inside to tell me about the strange lights outside. we live very close to the local airport, so weird lights in the sky don't realy phase me, but the look in my wife's eyes made me rush to see.
i look up to the ne sky to see five very bright lights, keep in mind that i have an unobstructed view of the horizon around my home. no cell towers, no chimeny stacks, nothing. to see five red lights in the sky in such a configuration saw startling to say the least.
the lights were in a backwards l formation, 1 high, 4 across. the lower 2 inside lights started to oscilate back and from each other. at one point a helicopter of unknown owership headed twords the lights, at that point they started to leave the area, heading in an east direction. people say the lights look like they were falling but technicaly if they were going away from you they would apear as if they were dropping.
this was the local newspaper's take of the incident

http://www.Dailyrecord.Com/apps/pbcs.Dll/article?Aid=200990105023
content.summary: Five bright lights in a tri-angle then l shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken from moving car on june 11, 2008 at 7:10 a.M., while on our way to abilene (home to dyess afb), for a doctor's appointment.
we (my husband and i) were driving west 1-20 and i was in the passenger seat.  i noticed a cumulonimbus cloud top with an odd feature, similar to a pyramid, so i pulled out my camera (sony cybershot) and took a picture, then stuck the camera back in my purse. i didn't download the picture until a month later.
i recently decided to go through all of last year's photos and delete ones i don't want to keep.  that's when i noticed this photo, that i took through the car window.  the landscape and clouds are blurry but i noticed the buzzard soaring in the sky was in fairly good focus, due to the fact that he too, was moving along in the direction we had been heading.  it was while i was looking at the buzzard, that i noticed some tiny white specks, much higher up and behind the bird (top center of frame).  i zoomed in on the specks.  two specks became 4 and then omg, there are dozens of them, some in triangle formations, others in line with each other and they are all over the sky.
i can't tell for sure if they are balloons, or what?
i have not cropped or changed the photo in any way and at the time i had just washed the car windows, so it isn't debris.  i'll leave it to you, to be the judge on what these might be.
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  riding as a passenger, going to a doctor's appointment in abilene.
2. what made you first notice the object?  i didn't notice the objects until today, after i began looking at the photo.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?  first thought came to mind was "balloons" but i've seen balloons in the air before and though they could be, i feel that they aren't.
as for the other questions, i can't describe what i never saw until now and my first reaction when i did finally look at the photo today, was, "omg!"
content.summary: Daytime photo of fleet of objects in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Last nite while laying in my bed with the television on watching the history channel at about 9:25pm i saw a very strange out of this world type of glow which illuminated the entire sky for about 5 or so seconds.  this happened 2x.  ironically, i did some research and people from other parts of nj reported the same type of event.  my event happened in south jersey, 18 miles east of philadelphia in marlton, nj.  it was also sleeting outside, but no way was it lightning.  i got up and stood at the window and looked for whatever it was.  i couldn't see anything, because it was above the clouds.  whatever it was, it illuminated the clouds and lit of the entire area.  

thanks!
jay
content.summary: Bright lights in the sky - turned sky weird white blue color--strange.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the n train (an elevated subway train) from queens into manhattan when i saw a shiny silver oval-shaped object hovering over inner queens.  i noticed it when i looked out of the left side window of the train as we were passing 36th avenue stop.  i got up and stared at the object until it was ultimately obscured by a bld when we turned into queensboro plaza.  the train went underground, and i went to work not paying it too much mind as there are often blimps around shea stadium.

a half hour later at work, i happened to look out the window at work (i work on the 50th floor of a bld in midtown) when i saw that same object hovering in the direction of new jersey.  i looked away briefly to say something to the person next to me and it was gone when i looked back.

shortly afterwards a helicopter flew from behind a bld seemingly much closer to me.  if there was something that was not supposed to be there, perhaps the pilot saw it too, and perhaps he or she is reading this now.

i might have dismissed this had i not seen the same object again on the other side of manhattan.  also odd is that any blimps in this area would be blue, have a met life or similar advertisement on it i would think.  this was bright silver.  

note, it was very cold for this area that day, in the low 20s if i recall.  not sure if that helps rule out blimps.  

i keep hearing more and more about sightings in this area.  hope this helps piece together the puzzle.
content.summary: Shiny oval-shaped object over queens, new york

content.detailedDescription:
Got up to get my child ready for school. went outside to smoke, it was very windy, i was looking at the fast moving clouds. i noticed what i thought was a star at first, but , it was too bright to be a star.
i thought it could be a plane, but, it didnt make any noise, and, it was moving extremely slow. so slow, i thought it was stationary at first. it was moving against the wind. it kept floating by, until, the tree line and clouds, obstructed my view of it. i said to myself, "that was freaky." i wanted to get my camera, but, didnt think id have time to.
content.summary: Slow moving bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
January 6th, 2009. 10:25pm. 

my friends and i were driving on a back road outside of cochran, georgia. we pulled over to stop and have a cigarette break between two open fields of cotton, with a wooded area further up ahead of us beyond the road, and we were admiring the clouds. the weather forecast had indicated a front moving in from the northwest, and the clouds were moving very quickly across the night sky. we were catching quick glimpses of the stars behind the clouds as they passed by and conversing about the coming week of school for us. 

as we were watching, suddenly an orb appeared from the direction the clouds were moving towards, and began to slowly move against the wind, in the opposite direction of the cloud movement. it was rather slow, but gradually moved across the sky just above the clouds. we followed it as it moved from just above the horizon in the distance, until it was right above us. 

as we were watching this, we were all excited and bewildered. we thought it may be a type of plane from the local air force base in warner robins, a mere 30 minute drive by car. but we concluded it certainly was not a plane of any kind, and one of my friends [who is involved with aviation] assured us it was certainly not anything he'd ever seen before. we watched the light as it moved, and then i noticed that there were more of these spherical lights approaching. and sure enough, more and more lights, which were bigger than stars and kind of pulsating, moved in the opposite direction of the clouds in our direction, and then overhead and past us.

we watched, waiting for another break in the low cloud cover to give us a better glimpse of them all, and one of my other friends noticed the lights were moving closely together, in what appeared to be a perfect triangle. we got to see this better when the clouds broke for a moment, and we saw what appeared to be more than one perfect triangular shapes of light. we all were pointing out a separate triangle in the sky and were amazed at the quickness these appeared from the orbs we'd just seen. each one had a lighted orb making up the corner, forming a perfect triangular shape. and they moved together, still moving against the wind and the clouds. 

i thought about this rationally and couldn't come up with an explanation, as i could plainly see the stars in their unmoving state, while these objects were moving quite readily across the night sky. and then when the clouds broke and we all could make out the shapes, we noticed they blocked out the stars above them as they passed by. they were massive objects, perhaps even forming into a single giant formation or craft or something. but we all watched as we saw the constellation of orion slowly black out as this thing passed above us. 

at this point we were all pretty much amazed, and kind of freaked out that we were witnessing this as it happened. suddenly there was a small flash of what appeared to be orange light through the clouds behind the object we could make out in the cloud break. as we watched it, the lights pulsed and then quickly moved off into the approaching cloud cover. they moved much faster than they did before. we all heard a low hum followed by a type of high-pitched whining noise as this happened; and when the clouds cleared again within 30 seconds, there was nothing at all but the few stars we could see to the horizon. immediately after this happened there was a massive gust of wind that was much stronger than the previous wind we'd been experiencing. it died down within a minute or so back to what it was like before.

we waited to see if we could see anything else, but there was just the quickening cloud cover and the stars as a backdrop to a fleeting experience. we continued to smoke, and after a few minutes of not seeing anything else decided to get back in the car and head back to the dorms of our school. needless to say we all saw something, and we believe it may have definitely been some type of ufo. but we all witnessed it and upon thinking carefully and rationally about it can't come to a adequate explanation to explain what we saw.
content.summary: Witnessed multiple orbs of light, that either merged into or form the shape of a large triangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
on the above date i was driving west on hawthorne pkwy in the cleveland metroparks south chagrin reservation. as i approached harper ridge picnic area, i noticed a very bright, white light in the west-south west sky. 
     i had originally seen and reported this same type of light back in june of 2008 but during that incident the light dimmed and within ten seconds or so was gone and did not return. 
     i thought to myself that it would be weird if this light went out like the light in '08 and just to see what would happen i shined the spotlight of the patrol car i was driving at the light. when i turned off the spotlight, the light in the sky dimmed and went out. i immediately turned around and drove into harper ridge, parked and grabbed my video camera, cell phone and binoculars. 
     for approximately the next ten to twelve minutes the light in the sky randomly dimmed, went out completely and came back on, all while remaining motionless. when the light would go out it would come back on in the same place. at times the light was so bright that it lit up the clouds surrounding it(like the moon on a cloudy night), although these "flares" seemed to be the exception rather than the rule; the light mostly stayed the brightness of a bright star. whenever it dimmed and went out there were no other lights in that area either flashing or steady. through binoculars the light appeared to have a definite center and did not look like a spotlight or diffused light from below.
     after about ten to twelve minutes i decided to drive to a nearby golf course that provides a clearer view of the sky. while driving to the course, the light was out of my view and by the time i got there(about 5 mins), the light was gone. i stayed at the course for about another 30 mins but the light did not return. i called my wife and my sister to have them witness this event while i was at harper ridge but neither could see the object from where they were. 
     i was able to capture about two and a half minutes of video of this object. in the videos, the light is visible above and to the right of lights from the city of solon. even though the sky was not very cloudy and was bright that night, in the videos the sky is just black. also, the light starts to dim toward the end of both videos(after the first it stayed out for about 30-45 seconds then came back; after the second i drove to the golf course) but neither video catches the light coming back on. 
     just a note of caution, if the audio comes through you may hear some coarse language from me. if you're offended by that you may want to lower the volume on your computer.
content.summary: Bright light in sky slowly dimming

content.detailedDescription: I was letting the puppy out front to go to the bathroom. i happened to look acrossed the street and caught something moving acrossed the roof of the neighbors house. i strated to look harder and saw what looked like 3 red lights in a straight line, blinking in order. after a few mins of watching them and the puppy was done, i went in to get my camera. i took a few shoots but they came out blurry. i tried with flash and with out just incase. i also tried to take a viedo. while i was taking these pictures, i also noticed that there was no sound. the object moved around the sky over the neighbors house, past there tree, then down the street. but started to work its way back over the neighbors house again. the lights never changed colors, just stayed red.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 3 lights on what looked like oval shaped ufo.
